meta_desc: Aura Adriatica — boutique apartments Olive & Onyx on the Opatija Riviera. Explore Lovran, beaches, Lungomare, Učka mountain, gastronomy and day trips.
tagline: Two boutique apartments on the Opatija Riviera.
about_p: Welcome to Aura Adriatica — your perfect getaway on the Opatija Riviera. Enjoy comfort, modern design, and stunning views of the Adriatic Sea.
olive_meta: Olive — sea view, balcony, AC, Wi-Fi
olive_intro: Sea view, balcony, AC, Wi-Fi — ideal for 2–4 guests.
onyx_intro: Terrace, garden access, AC, Wi-Fi — ideal for 2–4 guests.
avail_note: Select your dates to check availability.
loc_p: We are located in Ičići, a charming coastal town near Opatija, Croatia. The beach, marina, and Učka mountain trails are all within walking distance.
explore_intro: Beaches, Lungomare, Učka trails, gastronomy & day trips.
explore_about_p: A charming coastal town beside Opatija — medieval old town, beaches, and the famous seaside promenade (Lungomare).
explore_do_list: Walk the 12 km Lungomare seaside promenade
Hike Mount Učka — viewpoints, nature park trails
Stroll Lovran’s medieval old town & harbor
Rent SUP/kayak or join a boat tour
Visit Opatija’s villas, parks and the coastal boulevard
Seasonal events: Marunada (chestnut fest), Advent, concerts
explore_beaches_list: Ičići Beach — Blue Flag pebble beach with marina & facilities
Medveja Beach — spacious bay with crystal clear water
Lovran town beach — family-friendly spot near the center
Pebble coves along Lungomare between Lovran & Opatija
explore_trips_list: Rijeka — lively market, Trsat Castle, museums
Istrian gems: Rovinj, Pula amphitheatre, Motovun hilltown
Islands of Cres & Krk — beaches and quaint villages
Plitvice Lakes National Park (longer full-day trip)
